features: ORGANIZE KITCHEN & SAVE SPACE: Clear drawer space without forgoing an organized kitchen. The rotating kitchen utensil caddy is large enough to store kitchen utensils, like silverware, spatulas, ladles, spoons, tongs, whisks, chopsticks and more on the countertop.

GENEROUS CAPACITY & EASY ACCESS: Accommodates utensils of all sizes. The utensil holder rotates easily and smoothly, allowing easy access to all kitchen utensils while cooking, serving, or grilling. Utensil holder has stable base to prevent toppling over.
VERSATILE ORGANIZATION: Sturdy removable partition sections the utensil holder, enabling different utensils to be kept in different compartments. When removed allows holder to fit more utensils.

STEADY GRIP: The utensil holder is set on a sturdy plastic base with a steady grip. Will sit firmly on countertop even as rotated. Won't slip, slide, or wobble. Requires minimal care and cleaning. Handwashing recommended.

GREAT VALUE: Utensil holder is 7" in diameter with a height of 7.5". BPA-free, non toxic, chemical and lead-free. High quality modern satin stainless steel, trimmed with mirror bands, complements any kitchen design.
body.description: The professional styling of OGGI's Jumbo Stainless Steel Utensil Holder with removable partition enhances the countertop of any kitchen. With it's extra generous 7-inch opening, this stainless steel holder can house a multitude of cooking tools both large and small, keeping them close at hand for an quick grab. The beautiful satin finish is trimmed with mirror bands working well in any kitchen decor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rotates for Accessing Any and All Kitchen Utensils While Cooking, Serving, or Grilling The professional styling of Oggi's Jumbo Rotating Stainless Steel Utensil Holder with removable partition enhances the countertop of any kitchen. With it's extra generous 7-inch opening, this stainless steel holder can house a multitude of cooking tools both large and small, keeping them close at hand for a quick grab which is made even easier thanks to its smooth rotating action. The removable partition enables better organization, avoiding tools getting lost or stuck in the utensil holder. The beautiful satin finish is trimmed with mirror bands working well in any kitchen decor.Requires minimal care and cleaning. Handwashing recommended.

Why Buy the Oggi Jumbo Rotating Utensil Holder Rotates for Ease of Access The Oggi Jumbo Rotating Utensil Holder rotates easily and smoothly, allowing easy access to all kitchen utensils while cooking, serving, or grilling. This utensil holder also has a stable base to prevent toppling over Includes Removable Divider A sturdy removable partition sections the utensil holder, enabling different utensils to be kept in different compartments. When the partition is removed it allows the holder to fit even more utensils Generous Capacity Clear drawer space without forgoing an organized kitchen. The rotating kitchen utensil caddy is large enough to store kitchen utensils, like silverware, spatulas, ladles, spoons, tongs, whisks, chopsticks and more on the countertop

A Little Bit About Oggi Oggi is a family business, founded in Anaheim California in 1994. Oggi is an Italian word meaning today. Our passion at Oggi is creating exciting, contemporary lifestyle products at amazing prices helping you to live for today. What does living for today mean to you? For us at Oggi it means simply living a truly great day that's in line with everything you want out of life, and that includes health, good relationships, fun moments and everything else. We believe that a life well lived should be achievable for everyone and that is why Oggi specializes in creating stylish and affordable products. Check out our full range of products in the Oggi brand store, and remember, with Oggi... life starts today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size and holds a lot of kitchen tools
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this product. I bought it to replace a similar smaller one that I owned. This is is about 25% larger and has a removable divider. I also really like the rotating feature. It’s nicely made and solid feeling 👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a large and very attractive piece. I love that it spins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the size, capacity and rotating base
reviews.reviewText: I have some cooking utensils that have big grips on them, and this makes it handier to retrieve one, without others getting caught and making it awkward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's large, heavy enough to stay put and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value!! Looks great on my counter.
reviews.reviewText: Great size, holds lots. I like the rotating feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds many utensils for the size
reviews.reviewText: The cannister itself is sturdy and nice looking. The divider is OK but very light weight and loose inside the holder. Still I'm able to get a large number of cooking utensils inside. I wish it was just a little wider. The dimensions are accurate but until i got it I really wasn't sure how much it would hold. I'm satisfied but I did buy another container at Walmart for the additional tools I couldn't fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really don’t have anything bad to say about these. I ordered three, but ended up needing only two… because they work even better than I was anticipating. And I put A LOT of cooking utensils in them, along with two knives which were too long for our knives drawer. If you use the quarter compartments for the taller stuff, it helps to keep everything more vertical and in its place (it doesn’t look as messy and items don’t end up pushing over to another compartment). I was worried that the base wouldn’t be weighted enough; but, even though it feels light, it isn’t unstable at all - even when spinning around. I initially thought these were a little pricy, but now I think they’re a good value for how well they look and perform. I’m even going to keep the extra. I’m sure I’ll find another use for it. It seems like this organization tool would be very versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large enough and rotates well
reviews.reviewText: I needed a larger utensil holder and this one is a good size. The rotating feature is nice too.

The quality is very good. It's sturdy and does not tip over. The removeable divider keeps the utensils in better order. It is perfect for my needs. It has been the best solution for ordering my kitchen drawer chaos! No more clutter! My kitchen drawer does not get jammed up and will open smoothly now that the cooking tools are not blocking things up. I can easily find and grab what I need while cooking. So awesome!

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks nice and holds fair amount
reviews.reviewText: Like the shiny top and bottom brushed stainless in the middle the fact that it rotates is bonusI’m trying the dividers but might remove. To fit more tools overall good Quality is evident
